Race.SpecificTitle: PW School Board -- 7.68 Mills - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition
(Maintenance Millage Renewal)

Summary:  Authority for the Cameron Parish School Board to continue to levy a 7.68-mill property tax for an additional 10 years, beginning 2011, with collections from the levy of the tax estimated to be $1,822,886 for one entire year, for the maintenance, operation and improvement of the public elementary and secondary schools of Cameron Parish.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish School Board of the Parish of Cameron, State of Louisiana, continue to levy and collect a special tax of seven and sixty-eight one-hundredths on all property subject to taxation in Cameron Parish, for an additional period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2011 and ending with the year 2020, with collections from the levy of the tax estimated to be $1,822,886 for one entire year, for the maintenance, operation and improvement of the public schools of Cameron Parish, pursuant to Article VIII, Section 13(C)(Third) of the Louisiana Constitution of 1974?
